entry.title: 3M STA-840013 - 3M Standard Abrasives Quick Change TS Buff and Blend GP Disc, 840013, A FIN A/O, 3/4 in STA-840013 7000046844
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 52.25

[shortdesc]

3M Standard Abrasives Quick Change TS Buff and Blend GP Disc, 840013, A FIN A/O, 3/4 in

  • 3M™ Standard Abrasives™ Quick Change TS Buff and Blend GP Disc 840013 is made from tough, resin-reinforced nylon fiber with abrasive grain
  • It is an ideal choice for general-duty applications as it provides a high cut rate while producing consistent finishes
  • It blends minor surface imperfections, handling marks and coated abrasives secondary burrs
  • The center hole discs may be ganged on a shaft and used as a wheel
  • It resists loading, which means no metal contamination to the work piece
  • The Quick Change TS System is the most popular style for safety, productivity and fast disc changes
  • Change discs by simply twisting to unlock the disc from the holder pad.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • Blends minor surface imperfections, handling marks, coated abrasives secondary burrs
  • Center hole discs may be ganged on a shaft and used as a wheel
  • Resists loading
  • no metal contamination to the work piece

entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Roloc Discs
Price: 0.76

[shortdesc]

3M Roloc TR Disc, 361F, YF-weight, grade P100, 2 in

  • The 3M™ Roloc™ Disc 361F offers a quick-change attachment and provides durability and high performance for grinding, blending, deburring, and finishing on all metals
  • Fast-cutting aluminum oxide abrasive grains are bonded to the heavyweight cloth backing with durable, heat-resistant resin that supports both wet and dry applications.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Roloc
    Application Finishing, Finishing, Grinding, Surface Finishing, Metalworking
    Color Brown
    Diameter 2 Inch
    Grit 100
    Material 361F
    Mineral Aluminum Oxide
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Roloc Discs

    Product Information

  • 3M™ Roloc™ Attachment enables efficient and secure installation and removal of the disc
  • Tough YF-weight, polyester backing supports medium-pressure applications and provides consistent performance
  • Heat-resistant resin coating bonds abrasive to backing for durability under pressure, heat, and water
  • Discs can be used in wet or dry applications

entry.title: Merit 99631 - 1-1/2 Inch Quickchange Disc 100 Grit Aluminum Oxide Aluminum Oxide 69957399631
entry.summary:
Vendor: Merit
Type: Roloc Discs
Price: 0.42

[shortdesc]
  • Remove scratches, ridges, gouges and other flaws in soft metals, bronze, brass and stainless steel by using this Merit A/O medium grit TS (Type II) quick-change cloth disc with a right angle grinder
  • The ideal tool for cleaning, detailing and deburring tasks, this long-lasting and economical medium grit disc offers an aluminum oxide abrasive that delivers quick, efficient cuts and is more durable than similar aluminum oxide discs
  • To extend its longevity, this disc features a two-ply polyester backing that lends extra strength.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand Merit
    Diameter 1-1/2 Inch
    Grit 100
    Mineral Aluminum Oxide
    Product Type Roloc Discs

    Product Information

  • Versatile aluminum oxide abrasive for aggressive cut and longer life than competitive aluminum oxide discs
  • Durable Y-weight 2-ply polyester backing and coating for additional life and faster cut rate on moderately-demanding applications
  • Good choice when initial price is the primary purchasing consideration
  • Medium grit for deburring, cleaning, and detailing stainless, soft metals like aluminum, carbon steels, and titanium
    		•
